oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: The New Digital Bleek and Lloyd Archive
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: ||kabbo (Jantje) (II)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Hunting the 'Loffelhund' (Proteles) and Jackal. (L II.-1. 217 and 218.) The man hunts various animals with a dog. The dog catches and bites the animals, after which the man beats them to death with a stick. 1) Note on the inside of the back cover of this notebook: 'Finished correcting Sept 15/71 from Jantje Toorm himself', 2) This story is found in Book II-1.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hunting animals with dogs
